languages.text:
The wearer uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.
Whenever the wearer dodges an attack, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
The wearer uses Willpower for dodge tests instead of Agility.
Whenever the wearer dodges an attack, they gain +1 psy rating until the end of their next turn. Stacks.

The wearer uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.
Whenever the wearer dodges an attack, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

The wearer uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.
Whenever the wearer dodges an attack, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

languages.text:
装备者会使用{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}属性来进行{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，不再基于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}属性。
每当装备者闪避攻击时，{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}都会提高1级，效果直到下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束为止。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text:
The wearer uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.
Whenever the wearer dodges an attack, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
装备者会使用{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}属性来进行{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，不再基于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}属性。
每当装备者闪避攻击时，{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}都会提高1级，效果直到下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束为止。此效果可叠加。

languages.text:
При {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверках{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} позволяет использовать значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} вместо {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}.
При успешном уклонении {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} персонажа увеличивается на 1 до конца его следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text:
The wearer uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.
Whenever the wearer dodges an attack, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
При проверках уклонения позволяет использовать значение Воли вместо Ловкости.
При успешном уклонении пси-рейтинг персонажа увеличивается на 1 до конца его следующего хода. Эффект суммируется.

При проверках уклонения позволяет использовать значение Воли вместо Ловкости.
При успешном уклонении пси-рейтинг персонажа увеличивается на 1 до конца его следующего хода. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text:
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}の代わりに、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}を使用する。
使用者は攻撃を回避し、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終了時まで、{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}を1獲得する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text:
The wearer uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.
Whenever the wearer dodges an attack, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}の代わりに、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}を使用する。
使用者は攻撃を回避し、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終了時まで、{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}を1獲得する。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text:
El portador usa su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} para {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} en vez de su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}.
Cada vez que el portador esquiva un ataque, obtiene +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} hasta que termine su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text:
The wearer uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.
Whenever the wearer dodges an attack, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
El portador usa su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} para {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivar{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} en vez de su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}.
Cada vez que el portador esquiva un ataque, obtiene +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} hasta que termine su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text:
Der Träger nutzt {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} anstelle von {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} für {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g}.
Wenn der Träger einem Angriff ausweicht, erhält er bis zum Ende seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g}. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text:
The wearer uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.
Whenever the wearer dodges an attack, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger nutzt {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} anstatt {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} für {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g}.
Immer wenn der Träger einem Angriff ausweicht, erhält er +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} bis zum Ende seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g}. Addiert sich.

languages.text:
L'utilisateur a recours à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} au lieu de l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} pour les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}.
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur esquive une attaque, il bénéficie de +1 d'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Cumulable.
languages.original_text:
The wearer uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.
Whenever the wearer dodges an attack, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
L'utilisateur a recours à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} au lieu de l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} pour les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g}.
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur esquive une attaque, il bénéficie de +1 d'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Cumulable.

L'utilisateur a recours à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} au lieu de l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} pour les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g}.
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur esquive une attaque, il bénéficie de +1 d'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Cumulable.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testleri{/g} için {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} yerine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} niteliğini kullanır.
Takan kişi, bir saldırıdan her kaçındığında +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g} kazanır. Bu etki bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sonlanana dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text:

Whenever the wearer dodges an attack, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.
